Question: Q. If \( (x - 3)^2 = 16 \), what are the possible values of \( x \)?
Q.Solve the inequality \( 2x^2 - 5x + 3 > 0 \). What is the solution set?
Q.If \( \frac{2x - 1}{3} + 5 = \frac{4 - x}{2} \), what is the value of \( x \)?
Q.The sum of two numbers is 15, and their product is 54. What are the numbers?
Q.Solve the system of equations:\[\begin{align*}2x + 3y &= 7 \\4x - y &= 5\end{align*}\]
Q.If \( \frac{3}{x-2} + \frac{1}{x} = \frac{4}{x^2 - 2x} \), what is the value of \( x \)?
Q.Solve the system of equations:\[\begin{align*}3x - 2y &= 4 \\2x + y &= 1\end{align*}\]
Q.If \( \sqrt{3x} = 5 \), what is the value of \( x \)?
Q.Solve the inequality \( 2x^2 - 3x - 5 \leq 0 \). What is the solution set?
Q.If \( \frac{2}{x-1} - \frac{3}{x} = \frac{1}{x+1} \), what is the value of \( x \)?
Q.Solve the system of equations:\[\begin{align*}2x + y &= 7 \\4x - 3y &= 10\end{align*}\]
Q.If \( \frac{2}{x-3} + \frac{3}{x} = \frac{5}{x+3} \), what is the value of \( x \)?
Q.Solve the system of equations:\[\begin{align*}3x - y &= 5 \\x + 2y &= 4\end{align*}\]
